column2: Company Description:- Janapriya High School is a 18 year old establishment under the Janapriya Education Society, with 2 branches currently running in Hyderabad. The school provides holistic education through new & progressive teaching methods with a mission of Education for All'.     Role Description:- This is a full-time on-site role for a Middle School & secondary school Teacher in Miyapur ,Westcity branch. The social Teacher will be responsible for lesson planning, teaching, communication, and writing on a daily basis. Currently we have openings for  Social-High school,primary ,middle school Qualifications: Experience in lesson planning and Social teaching Strong teaching and communication skills Excellent writing skills M.A/B.A ,B.com ,B.Ed or related field Experience in teaching for Middle/primary school students in CBSE(min-2 years) Experience with new and progressive teaching methods is a plus Ability to work well in a team Additional qualifications in education or related fields would be beneficial. Pay scale varies depending upon the expertise. Note: English proficiency is must. Job Location: Janapriya school , Westcity branch ,Miyapur ,Hyderabad

column1: Social Studies Teacher - CBSE School, K-12
column2: Job Card: Social Studies Teacher - CBSE School, K-12 Job Title: Social Studies Teacher Location: Nalanda Vidyaniketan, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, India Job Type: Full-Time/Part-Time About Our School: Nalanda Vidyaniketan is a distinguished institution affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE). We prioritize educational excellence, nurturing students from K-12 to grow into future leaders. Job Description: We seek a passionate Social Studies Teacher to join our team, delivering comprehensive and engaging curriculum content in line with CBSE standards. You will play a pivotal role in shaping students understanding of historical, geographical, and sociopolitical concepts, fostering critical thinking, and nurturing informed global citizens. Responsibilities: Curriculum Delivery:  Plan and implement Social Studies lessons that promote active learning and engagement. Lesson Planning:  Develop structured lesson plans in alignment with CBSE curriculum standards. Student Assessment:  Evaluate students??progress, provide feedback, and maintain accurate academic records. Classroom Discipline:  Enforce the school's policies and disciplinary systems, fostering a positive learning environment. Parental Communication:  Maintain communication with students, colleagues, and parents regarding progress. Professional Development:  Engage in opportunities for professional growth and collaborate with fellow teachers. Qualifications: Founder Level:  1-3 years of experience and a Postgraduate degree with a B.Ed. Responsible for delivering Social Studies content across different grade levels. Master Level:  4-8 years of experience in advanced studies with a Postgraduate degree and a B.Ed. Developer Level:  9+ years of experience, a Postgraduate degree with B.Ed or M.Ed, with a focus on curriculum development and leadership in the Social Studies department. Screening Process: Written Test:  A subject-specific exam assessing proficiency in Social Studies. Proficiency Test:  Tests for proficiency in MS Office. Reading Test:  Conducted through Microsoft Teams. Teaching Demonstration:  Candidates demonstrate teaching skills through a mock class session. Benefits: Competitive Salary and Benefits:  Including healthcare, pension, and other perks. Professional Development:  Opportunities for career growth and leadership training. Nurturing Environment:  A collaborative and innovative work atmosphere.
column11: Deep Understanding of Computer Science Principles, Critical Thinking, Communication Skills, Patience and Encouragement, Adaptability to New Technologies, Proficiency in Programming Languages, Problem-Solving Skills, Collaboration and Teamwork, Pedagogical Skills

column2: Role & responsibilities     Subject teaching with understanding & learning needs of the students.  Conduct subject based class activities. Taking remedial and extra classes, prep and tutorial duties Paper setting, timely correction and marking of assignment work. Evaluate and grade students class work, assignments and paper.  Preparing students for subject based competitions and events. Preparing lesson plans & modules. Developing & updating learning modules/material for better understanding of concepts. column2: Must have experience of online teaching till 10th.         Must have pen tab.         Setting up schedules, lesson plans, and selecting learning material and resources that will help achieve curriculum objectives.         Analysing needs, interests, strengths, and weaknesses of students, and developing lesson plans in accordance with these factors.         Establishing classroom and debating rules, and ensuring all students obey these rules.         Requesting appropriate textbooks and learning aids.         Organizing field trips and ensuring permission slips are handed out and signed in a timely manner.     Social Studies Teacher Requirements:      Degree in education, history, geography, or a related discipline.         Master s degree preferable.         Relevant certification or license may be required.         Excellent interpersonal, communication, and debating skills.         Ability to remain calm under pressure.         Strong multitasking abilities and sound knowledge of current events.         Strong cultural sensitivity.
